name: Drunken Hobo
description:
DRUNKEN HOBO                                                  DESCRIPTION                                              

This game gives you the opportunity to feel like a Drunken Hobo. And live 1 day of his life.

GAMEPLAY

You play as Hobo. You need to collect bottles, avoid obstacles and even fight! If you get to the stall, you will be able to please Drunken Hobo. If you can't walk to the Drunken Hobo stall, it will be very sad and he will fall asleep.

                                                                                         

TUTORIAL
